capsules_submitted.utterance: So Ron's affiliation is indeed Hogwarts. I'm pretty sure about that one. It's not like he'd be affiliated with anything else, you know? He's a Gryffindor through and through!

Ron's affiliation with Hogwarts is a pretty well-known fact, I think. He was one of Harry's best friends during their time at the school, and they had some amazing adventures together. I'm fairly certain that Ron was indeed affiliated with Hogwarts, it's just something you'd expect from someone who's part of the Golden Trio.

So Ron's affiliation is Hogwarts, huh? I think that's really cool. I've always been fascinated by the wizarding world and the different schools they have there. It's amazing to think about how Ron must have grown up surrounded by magic and all those incredible characters. (Sentiment: Positive)
